entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error after upgrading to 8.0.114 on ubuntu 24.04 #47735
  • `dotnet test` for MTP doesn't correctly work with retry extension #47725
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • Discuss the handling of `RunSettingsFilePath` in new dotnet test experience #47636
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow winforms binaries in the VMR #47745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate nuget packages from asset manifests baseline #47742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux-Bionic should build like Android, no rootfs #47739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test for MTP Retry feature #47727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge redist installer with redist #47659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix scenario-tests not uploading results to AzDO #47737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove publishing opt-out for nuget assets #47708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #47732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve baselining #47700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update prerelease branding for preview 4 #47709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump versions for test templates #47688
    Area-Infrastructure
  • .NET Source-Build 10.0.100-preview.2.25164.1 March 2025 Updates #47699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix runtimeIdentifier for macOS PR jobs #47733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add cgmanifest.json for test templates #47652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove RunSettingsFilePath support from dotnet test for MTP #47706
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Remove no longer used TestOptions.Configuration #47703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR

Updated

  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds incrementalism to DefineStaticWebAssets #47701
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Force OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow container targets to be loaded in more scenarios, even if the targets will be skipped #47693
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Decoupling Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #46477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.3xx] light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47691
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for March #47710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
